DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare canine guidance ( CG ) bilateral balance occlusion ( BBO ) denture satisfaction kinesiographic parameter complete denture wearer , mean cross-over trial . Edentulous patient receive new maxillary mandibular complete denture , intraoral adjustment adaptation period , randomly receive sequence occlusal scheme : BBO follow CG , CG follow BBO .
DOC.brief_title: Canine Guidance v Bilateral Balanced Occlusion Complete Denture
DOC.criteria: Adult patient need new complete denture Mentally receptiveness Absence dysfunctional disorder masticatory system Normal volume resilience residual edentulous ridge Absence debilitate systemic disease Use cardiac pacemaker Refusal participate inability provide informed consent
